author: Steve W
comment: I love the appearance of this watchface, but things just don't work no matter your setting. Peak and translucent cards don't work. Notifications only work sometimes. Tapping the center changes the color scheme, and you lose those settings. Maybe it'll get some bug fixes in the future.

author: VanguardFed
comment: Really great watchface, love all the details it gives effectively, clearly, and neatly.  One major issue I have is that if you allow interactivity and touch the digital clock then you lose your custom colors and it cycles through presets. This is really annoying, and the only way to avoid it is to completely turn off interactivity and that stops a lot of other features. I really wish there was just a setting to turn that off.

author: FlyBabies123
comment: I have Pixel XL phone and the Find My Phone on my Huawei watch worked at first then didn't and the worked for one day then not. My husband has this app on his Huawei watch with a Moto g Force or something like that and his Find  My Phone never faltered working.      .......Also the temperature doesn't seem to change on watch unless I update on phone first.

author: Brad Davidson
comment: Love all the rich face watches but uninstalled them all, even my paid ones because I don't need to be reminded every 15 minutes when an update occurs!

author: Mitchell Pollock
comment: Been Harrassed all day with sale messages. I've uninstalled all of your watch faces and you can shove it.

author: Steve Freeman
comment: Weather feature doesn't work

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Good, but no basic color picker and doesn't vibrate hourly.

author: Jason Wentzel
comment: Weather doesn't auto update.

author: jonnathon Clayton
comment: Great watchface, use it as my daily, my battery is still at 60 or better after a full days use14hrs or so with ambient mode on... Only complaint is the tap to switch colors, changes face colors every time I tap to wake the watch... Would be nice if there was an option to disable color switching...

author: Chris Russell
comment: Great watch face, but there was an update where the author made it have its own time zone that's separate from the watch. As a frequent traveler, this is pretty annoying because I have to manually set the time zone whenever I get off the plane, even though every other watch face on the watch automatically changes to match the new time zone except this one.  If it weren't for this, I'd give it a perfect rating.

author: Fouad Shawly
comment: I love this watch face with all its features. But, the watch screen does not go off automatically when I turn the watch away from me like the built-in watch faces do, I would love for this feature to be added, I would have given this 5 stars if this feature was added.
title: It's great but

author: Jean-Jacques Bouillet
comment: I have been using this app for about 2 weeks and it has been working great.  I like how you can customize the colors for active and inactive situations.  I'm not giving an extra star because I'm not sure if the temperature shown is entirely accurate, but otherwise I'm happy with it.  I'm using a fossil Q Founder watch with Android 6.0 paired with a  Moto G 3rd generation dual SIM phone.
title: Cool design with custom colors

author: Daniel Biermann
comment: I would very much like to know how to suitable the function that changes my theme every time I touch the middle of the screen. That was a petty awful idea to incorporate as a default. If I can't turn that off, please update the application with changes to allow it.
title: Rather groovy

author: jiri podzimek
comment: Tried many of watch faces, but keep returning back to this one...recently find out, watch face doesn't change local time when I  travel to diferent time zones, have to use another watch faces which will work
title: Best looking watch faces

author: Pincu Ionescu
comment: My watch battery was killed within 4 hours of non-use thanks to your app.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

that is strange.. can you try with reinstall?

Regards

title: Destroys battery life

author: Jim Patteson
comment: It does everything I have been looking for, and even though the text is small, I can still read it....looks cool too...even on my square watch
title: Great!

author: Diep Hoac
comment: Watch face look beautiful,  if two more options added like unread messages and miss call so that is perfect watch forever but I still give 5 stars because doing hard work.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Aceman2112
comment: Can't get watch face to load up on my watch,had it before,not anymore did the whole reset,restart thing and still nothing.
title: Ere

author: Gavin DuBetz
comment: Looks great but changes color on its own constantly. Galaxy edge.
title: Color changes?

author: Nic Lush
comment: Everythink works fine but no weather reading.  Note 4 6.0.1 on  Moto 360 Sport.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

you need to enable Location on you phone.

Regards

title: No weather

comment: I would love to give the watchface 5 stars except every now and then it resets to the default colour configuation.Not a massive drama but a bit annoying when it is ongoing ( approx once a week)
title: My everyday watchface

author: ART 730
comment: gave it 3 stars because it's not recording my steps and u can't add the phone call widget

author: Martin Pakler
comment: Step count from Google fit wont update sometimes. Otherwise good looking watch face.

author: Shashwat Singh
comment: The pedometer doesn't refresh automatically.. I have to refresh it manually
title: Looks great but the pedometer doesn't refresh

author: Edwin Geerling
comment: It works on my ASUS 2 real nice and I can't stop playing with it. Great job!!
title: This is nice

author: Andriy Zarteskyy
comment: Does not support rectangular wetch good enough

author: Vladimir Lavrisiuk
comment: Initially the battery indicator wasn't working, but after 30 min, it must have synced and it works. I like it.
title: Battery indicator

author: Drew Webb
comment: Changes made on the phone don't sync to the watch. EDIT: Update seemed to fix this. Currently my favourite watch face.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

please check your connection with watch.
You can also try with restart.

Regards

title: Excellent

author: Johnathan Belfire
comment: This watch face always works flawlessly and is my favorite watch face to use.  Very Futuristic and high tech looking.
title: Great Futuristic Look

author: Gary Podorowsky
comment: Great looking, with lots of data options that fit perfectly on the watchface.  The best one I've tried.

author: Taylor Hutchinson
comment: The step counter doesn't work... this is great except the stop counter doesn't work and it will not connect with Google fit

author: Sean Kelly
comment: I wish I could lock in the watch face colors but still interact with the tools.

author: Steve Meier
comment: May favorite face yet on my Moto 360.   Beautifully designed. Please bring this to my new LG Watch Sport.

author: Charles Condon
comment: Can you please update compatability to work with Samsung gear s2

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please read description. It's not for Tizen OS

author: dan Bdan
comment: please add spotify controls thanks
title: not bad but

author: John Reed
comment: Sony smartwatch 3

author: Itay Raz
comment: Too small letters

author: Danville Lim
comment: Really Mice & Good.. Works perfectly
title: G Watch R

author: Maurice Duijnhouwer
comment: best looking wf also in ambient mode

author: Reuben
comment: It's a great watch face
